column5: Just wondering if anyone can share some info on this park and the lake. I will be travelling up that way in  july and hope to be staying there and doing some fishing for a couple days. Any info on the park and lake would be wonderful,thanks

Do a search, they have a good website, forget the addy though???  Beautiful campgrounds there, and great fishing right off the beach (walleyes)  I used to take my kids there when I worked for Weyerhaueser in Ear Falls
Another bonus,Lac Seul is just down the road. 1 of the best walleye fisheries in Ont.
